parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being considered electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be officially sanctioned campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions the PNL (Partidul Național Liberal) party.  This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. It's not a private message; therefore, it addresses the wide population, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The statement "Eu aleg să susțin echipa PNL și stabilitatea!" ("I choose to support the PNL team and stability!") clearly aims to influence voters to support the PNL. This demonstrates an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The call to "Gândiți cu înțelepciune pentru viitorul nostru comun!" ("Think wisely about our common future!") further reinforces this objective by implicitly linking the PNL to a positive future.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It doesn't present objective facts, diverse perspectives, or verifiable evidence. Instead, it promotes a specific political party, lacking the neutrality expected from journalism.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the initial sentence about respecting opinions could be interpreted as a neutral statement, it's immediately followed by a clear endorsement of the PNL, negating any claim of purely personal opinion. The overall message is clearly intended to sway voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>581415000943629</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Rafael Nichita, fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a specific political party (PNL), targets a wide audience through a paid advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PNL.  The post's content lacks journalistic neutrality and presents a partisan message.  The fact that the post was published after the official campaign period ended (end_date: 1732953600, which corresponds to November 23rd, 2024, after 6 PM) further strengthens the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Rafael Nichita, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 581415000943629, care promovează Partidul Național Liberal (PNL) printr-un mesaj explicit de susținere ("Eu aleg să susțin echipa PNL și stabilitatea!") și îndeamnă la vot pentru acest partid, având un efect electoral clar pozitiv pentru PNL. Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a atins o estimare de 6.000-7.000 de impresii, conform datelor din Ad Library, și a vizat utilizatori din județul Constanța, cu vârste cuprinse între 18 și 65 de ani.  Această postare constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale, conform legislației în vigoare, și este o încălcare clară a articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  Datele de contact ale lui Rafael Nichita sunt rafaelnichita77@gmail.com și +40722590573.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
